hymn.title: My Beloved is mine and I am His

layout.singingstanza: My Be -- lov -- ed is mine and I am His, His ban -- ner o -- ver me is love; My Be -- lov -- ed is mine and I am His, His ban -- ner o -- ver me is love; My Be -- lov -- ed is mine and I am His, His ban -- ner o -- ver me is love; His ban -- ner o -- ver me is love.

lyrics.stanza: He brought me to His banqueting table...
He lifted me up into heavenly places...
My Beloved is mine and I am His...
